content: At the end of Q4, ARR reached $111.4 million, delivering a 26.4% year-over-year increase, demonstrating the continued growth and scaling of our subscription services engine. Total revenues were $97.7 million for the three months ended December 31, 2022, an increase of 19.7% compared to the three months ended December 31, 2021, with growth coming from both restaurant retail and government segments. Our total recurring revenue base, which includes both subscription services and hardware support contracts within professional services continues to expand with $34.9 million reported in Q4 2022, an increase of 34.2% compared to the $26 million in Q4 2021.
